ing: 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna in water, drained
des: "A new and exciting way to dress up your standard tuna salad. Serve as an appetizer with rich crackers or with a lettuce leaf and melba toast."
ins: In a blender or food processor, combine eggs, mayonnaise, sour cream, Worcestershire sauce, and mustard. Season with dill, rosemary, and lemon zest, salt. and pepper. Blend until smooth, then spoon into a medium bowl. Stir in tuna.
